message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,300,000 feels appropriate.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  However, the value this product offers is truly significant.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,250,000?
I understand that the product has significant value, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1,150,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about we try $1,225,000?
